mapper.select: select a.styling_num as styling_num, a.styling_name as styling_name, a.styling_price as styling_price ,b.des_name as des_name from styling a inner join designer b on a.des_num = b.des_num
mapper.insert: select styling_seq.nextval from dual INSERT INTO styling(styling_num , des_num, styling_name, styling_price, styling_option) VALUES(#{styling_num}, #{des_num}, #{styling_name},#{styling_price},#{styling_option})
